Welcome to pyETT’s documentation!¶

Python API for Eleven VR Table Tennis data.

User Documentation:

  • Getting Started
    • Player and user search
    • Matches and rounds
    • Friends list, leaderboard and elo history

Installation¶

From PyPI

$ pip install pyETT

Collaborate¶

Fork me at https://github.com/souzatharsis/pyETT.
